text: Tauno Majuri (1907–1980) was a Finnish stage and film actor.Kääpä p.174 He was married to the actress Kaisu Leppänen. ==Selected filmography== * The Face in the Mirror (1953) == References == == Bibliography == * Pietari Kääpä. title: Tauno Majuri
